name: rousing
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
making people feel excited and proud or ready to take action: We sang a last rousing chorus of the national anthem. She delivered a rousing speech full of anger and passion.

enthusiastic, or causing enthusiasm: a rousing speech They gave him a rousing welcome.
